ingredients.ingredient: ½ pound salt butterfish, rinsed several times to remove excess salt
½ pound pork butt, cut into 1 inch cubes

cookingTips: Rinse salt fish thoroughly multiple times to reduce saltiness and prevent overly salty final dish
Blanch taro leaves briefly to remove bitterness before wrapping around other ingredients
Wrap bundles with ti leaves and secure with kitchen string; steam for 1-1.5 hours until meats are tender
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook through this traditional Hawaiian dish, emphasizing proper salt fish preparation, taro leaf blanching, and steam cooking technique for tender bundles.
